poem:
Title: "Unyielding in the Face of Winter"

Fog breath and pure grit,
Streaks across a Slavic sky.
Iron promise cast-
"Our spirit will not break," cries
The lion in Kiev's heart.

Russian snow falls, yet
The fire of Ukraine's hearth,
Burns within each word,
Lives in their every breath-
Mankind's perennial spring.
